page.title: 09Alison's Friday 8.50_1.25
page.content: day starts at 8.50 am.When the bell goes, we all go to seperate{tutors. This is where we have the register taken and notices are given out. This is not a lesson and ends at 9.20 when I go to my first lesson. On a friday my first{lesson}is chemistry. We usually listen to the teacher explain an experiment and then we are allowed to go and do it. The double lesson ends at 10.45 am when we have a 20 minute break. After this I have a lesson of German where we work from a text book, called "Biberswald", and do alot of aural work in class . Next is a lesson of French, from 11.45 to 12.25. We then have an hour long {dinner}break. As a senior pupil I am allowed to use the{Youth Club.}Here I eat my sandwiches, play table tennis, snooker and listen to music until 1.25.
